results.title: Design and in vitro/in vivo evaluations of a multiple-drug-containing gingiva disc for periodontotherapy
results.text_hl: In the current work, we set out to develop and evaluate a gingiva disc of @CHEMICAL_cellulose_acetate_phthalate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C011708 @@@cellulose acetate phthalate@@@ and poloxamer F-127 for the simultaneous delivery of multiple drugs, namely @CHEMICAL_Minocycline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008911 @@@minocycline@@@, @CHEMICAL_Celecoxib @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068579 @@@celecoxib@@@, @CHEMICAL_Doxycycline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004318 @@@doxycycline hyclate@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, to abolish @DISEASE_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@infection@@@, impede @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@, avert @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis_Biliary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008105 @@@collagen destruction@@@, and promote alveolar bone regeneration, respectively.

citations.NLM: Jain P, Mirza MA, Talegaonkar S, Nandy S, Dudeja M, Sharma N, Anwer MK, Alshahrani SM, Iqbal Z. Design and in vitro/in vivo evaluations of a multiple-drug-containing gingiva disc for periodontotherapy  RSC Adv. 2020 Feb 24;10(14):8530-8538. PMID: 35497829
citations.BibTeX: @article{35497829, title={Design and in vitro/in vivo evaluations of a multiple-drug-containing gingiva disc for periodontotherapy }, author={Jain P and Mirza MA and Talegaonkar S and Nandy S and Dudeja M and Sharma N and Anwer MK and Alshahrani SM and Iqbal Z}, journal={RSC Adv}, volume={10}, number={14}, pages={8530-8538}}

results.title: Simvastatin-induced rhabdomyolysis.
results.text_hl: At a time of increasing use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and other "statin" drugs for @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ lowering, we report a case of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-induced acute massive @DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@rhabdomyolysis@@@ with @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@renal failure@@@ in a @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis_Biliary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008105 @@@primary biliary cirrhosis@@@, occurring 2 years after starting the drug.

citations.NLM: McNaughton H, Mumford CJ, Warlow CP. Simvastatin-induced rhabdomyolysis. Eur J Neurol. 1994 Nov;1(2):175-6. PMID: 24283488
citations.BibTeX: @article{24283488, title={Simvastatin-induced rhabdomyolysis.}, author={McNaughton H and Mumford CJ and Warlow CP}, journal={Eur J Neurol}, volume={1}, number={2}, pages={175-6}}

results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis_Biliary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008105 @@@primary biliary cirrhosis@@@: effects on serum @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipids@@@ and distinct disease markers.

results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ Attenuates @DISEASE_Liver_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@Liver Injury@@@ in Rodents with @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis_Biliary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008105 @@@Biliary Cirrhosis@@@ Submitted to @DISEASE_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D006470 @@@Hemorrhage@@@/Resuscitation.

results.title: Prevention of alveolar destruction and airspace enlargement in a mouse model of pulmonary lymphangioleiomyomatosis (LAM).
results.text_hl: Treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ markedly inhibited @GENE_MMP2 @GENE_17390 @@@MMP-2@@@, @GENE_MMP3 @GENE_17392 @@@MMP-3@@@, and @GENE_MMP9 @GENE_17395 @@@MMP-9@@@ levels in lung and prevented @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis_Biliary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008105 @@@alveolar destruction@@@.

citations.NLM: Goncharova EA, Goncharov DA, Fehrenbach M, Khavin I, Ducka B, Hino O, Colby TV, Merrilees MJ, Haczku A, Albelda SM, Krymskaya VP. Prevention of alveolar destruction and airspace enlargement in a mouse model of pulmonary lymphangioleiomyomatosis (LAM). Sci Transl Med. 2012 Oct 3;4(154):154ra134. PMID: 23035046

results.title: Retrospective review of combined sirolimus and simvastatin therapy in lymphangioleiomyomatosis.
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND: Combined @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Sirolimus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020123 @@@sirolimus@@@ therapy reduces tuberous sclerosis complex 2-null lesions and @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis_Biliary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008105 @@@alveolar destruction@@@ in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model of @DISEASE_Lymphangioleiomyomatosis @DISEASE_MESH:D018192 @@@lymphangioleiomyomatosis@@@ (@DISEASE_Lymphangioleiomyomatosis @DISEASE_MESH:D018192 @@@LAM@@@), suggesting that therapy with both drugs may benefit @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Lymphangioleiomyomatosis @DISEASE_MESH:D018192 @@@LAM@@@.

citations.NLM: Taveira-DaSilva AM, Jones AM, Julien-Williams PA, Stylianou M, Moss J. Retrospective review of combined sirolimus and simvastatin therapy in lymphangioleiomyomatosis. Chest. 2015 Jan;147(1):180-187. PMID: 25167325
citations.BibTeX: @article{25167325, title={Retrospective review of combined sirolimus and simvastatin therapy in lymphangioleiomyomatosis.}, author={Taveira-DaSilva AM and Jones AM and Julien-Williams PA and Stylianou M and Moss J}, journal={Chest}, volume={147}, number={1}, pages={180-187}}
